mapper.select: SELECT TX_ID AS txId, REQ_STEXT_DATE AS reqStextDate, REQ_STEXT_SEQ_NO AS reqStextSeqNo, MESSAGE AS message FROM ATMS_04001110
SELECT TX_ID AS txId, REQ_STEXT_DATE AS reqStextDate, REQ_STEXT_SEQ_NO AS reqStextSeqNo, MESSAGE AS message FROM ATMS_04001110 WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ATMS_04001110 SET REQ_STEXT_DATE = #{reqStextDate}, REQ_STEXT_SEQ_NO = #{reqStextSeqNo}, MESSAGE = #{message} WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}
INSERT INTO ATMS_04001110 ( TX_ID, REQ_STEXT_DATE, REQ_STEXT_SEQ_NO, MESSAGE ) VALUES ( #{txId}, #{reqStextDate}, #{reqStextSeqNo}, #{message} )
